why is voluntourism not so great there's

let's break it up necessary time a
really good example that puts this one

obviously orphans have been through a

a lot of psychological issues they have
a lot of emotional issues they have a
lot of attachment issues and when
volunteers go abroad to these orphanages
and they're staying for a few days a few
weeks maybe even a few months these
orphans create a bond with the people
coming to see them and coming to visit
after your time there you just leave and
it becomes this rotating door of
foreigners coming in and out of the
orphanage and again the kids create a
bond with each person that comes in and
out and there's no stability for them
and what these kids need more than
anything is stability and obviously
without meaning to sometimes there ends
up being more damage done from the lack
of stability so when you signed up for
volunteering projects it's really
